seo.description: Les Crêtes - Winegrowers since 1750 in Aymavilles (Aosta) - Production and bottling - Visit us and taste our wines - Discover the Wine Refuge

section2.title: Passion and innovation for over 200 years
section2.descrizione: The history of the Charrère family begins in 1750 and still thrives today with loyalty and respect for traditions and values passed down through generations. Attention to innovation and care for the land are the driving forces of a company that puts its soul and heart into winemaking.

section3.title: Taste our wines immersed in relaxation
section3.descrizione: Entering you can live a sensory experience, with an area dedicated to essences and a library with books of the Valle d'Aosta and wine, all this in a place where you can sit, read, drink a glass and take in the view.

section4.title: Mountain Wines: Authentic Expression of the Valle d'Aosta
section4.descrizione: Our fresh and elegant wines, that are full of flavour, express the essence of Valle d'Aosta’s mountain Terroir. They are created with passion and dedicated to novices and connoisseurs. The Alpine climate strongly influences the organoleptic characterics of the wines produced in Valle d'Aosta.

content.name: Merlot Le Merle Valle D'Aosta DOP

section5.descrizione: We are committed to environmental sustainability and follow the European guidelines for phytosanitary treatments, focusing on the limited use of pesticides. Our dedication to quality and passion for the surrounding area are at the heart of our philosophy.
section5.descrizione2: The key principle of our philosophy is to continue to follow the values of past generations, enhancing the 'Terroir' with fidelity and respect for traditions. However, our focus is always on the future of innovation that allows us to fully express the potential of the mountain wine territory of Valle d'Aosta.

section6.title: Beyond the Grape
section6.descrizione: Devin offers an innovative, natural and effective cosmetic formula, derived from organic extracts of the mountains, to meet the needs of those looking for high-performance natural products.
